cause.description:
Atkins is unhealthy! Don't do it! Eat the bread! EAT IT.
1. Canada's seal hunt must end immediately
2. Health care is a universal right.
3. Low-carb diets are not cool.
cause.mission: Spread awareness of the dangers of low carbohydrate intake in diets such as Atkins and South Beach.
cause.name: Abolish Low-Carb Diets
